Salut! :-) 
Je m'appelle Natalia. Je vis en Russie dans l'Oural. J'aime les sports, les romans de Stephen King et les parfums. J’aime la langue russe et je partage mes connaissances avec enthousiasme.
Hi! My name is Natalia. I live in Russia in the Urals. My hobbies: sports, novels by Stephen King and perfumery. I love the Russian language and am passionate about sharing my knowledge.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я преподаватель русского языка. Также я говорю по-французски. Самое важное для меня - прогресс моих студентов в изучении русского языка.
Je suis professeur de russe. Je parle aussi français. Pour moi, le plus important est le progrès de mes étudiants dans l’apprentissage du russe.
I am a teacher of Russian. I also speak French. For me, the most important thing is the progress of my students in learning Russian.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Для уроков я использую современные учебно-методические комплексы. На моих уроках всегда интересно! Мы слушаем русские песни, смотрим отрывки из русских фильмов, делаем викторины онлайн. Ещё мы много говорим по-русски и много смеемся. 
Pour mes cours, j’utilise des complexes pédagogiques et méthodiques modernes. Mes cours sont toujours intéressants! Nous écoutons des chansons russes, regardons des extraits de films russes, faisons des quiz en ligne. On parle beaucoup le russe et on rit. 
For lessons I use modern educational and methodical complexes. In my lessons are always interesting! We listen to Russian songs, watch excerpts from Russian films, do quizzes online.

edu_info.major: Teaching Russian as a foreign language

course_info.trial_description:
Salut! 30 minutes ce n'est pas beaucoup, mais c'est suffisant pour une connaissance et une première impression. À bientôt!
Hello! 30 minutes is not much, but enough for getting to know each other and making a first impression. See you soon!
Привет! 30 минут это немного, но достаточно для знакомства и первого впечатления. До скорой встречи!

pro_course_detail.title: Parlons en russe. Let's speak Russian! Поговорим по-русски!
pro_course_detail.description:
Bonjour! Vous étudiez le russe mais vous manquez de pratique conversationnelle ? Mes cours vont vous aider ! Vous n'avez pas besoin de proposer des sujets ou des questions, cela fait partie de ma préparation pour les cours. Ce sera amusant, excitant et très utile pour vous!
Hello! Are you studying Russian, but speaking practice is not enough for you? My lessons will help you! You do not need to come up with topics or questions, this is part of my preparation for the lessons. It will be fun, exciting and very useful!
Привет! Вы изучаете русский, но вам недостаточно разговорной практики? Мои уроки вам помогут! Вам не нужно придумывать темы или вопросы, это часть моей подготовки к урокам. Будет весело, увлекательно и очень полезно для вас!

pro_course_detail.title: Lecture et discussion. Reading and discussing. Читаем и обсуждаем.
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello! I like to read. If you also like to read, then sign up for my lessons! 
Salut! Je lis beaucoup. Aimez-vous lire? Chaque leçon que j’enseigne est composé de regarder des films de grands classiques ou écrivains modernes, la lecture et la discussion. Vous passerez chaque minute de la leçon avec profit.
Привет! Я много читаю. А вы любите читать? Каждый мой урок это просмотр экранизации русской классической или современной прозы, чтение и обсуждение. Вы проведете каждую минуту урока с пользой.

pro_course_detail.title: La langue russe pour les débutants. Russian for Beginners. Русский язык для начинающих.
pro_course_detail.description:
Salut! Si vous venez de commencer à apprendre le russe, alors inscrivez-vous à ma leçon! J'expliquerai clairement la grammaire et le vocabulaire. Vous apprendrez à écrire, lire, parler et comprendre le russe.

Привет! Если Вы только начали изучать русский язык, то записывайтесь ко мне на урок! Я объясню понятно грамматику и лексику. Вы научитесь читать, писать, говорить по-русски и понимать русскую речь.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык для продолжающих. Russe pour étudiants avancés.
pro_course_detail.description:
Salut! Vous souhaitez améliorer vos connaissances du russe et de la grammaire, parler couramment, bien comprendre l'oral? Dans mes cours, nous travaillerons sur cela ensemble. 
Hello! Do you want to improve your knowledge of the Russian language and grammar, speak fluently, understand spoken language well? In my lessons we will work together on this.
Привет! Хотите улучшить ваше знание русского языка и грамматики, говорить свободно, хорошо понимать устную речь? На моих уроках мы будем вместе работать над этим.

pro_course_detail.title: Langue russe pour la communication commerciale. Русский язык для делового общения.
pro_course_detail.description:
Salut! Je vous propose des cours de langue russe pour le travail et les affaires : rédaction d'un CV et préparation d'un entretien, correspondance commerciale, étiquette commerciale, communication professionnelle.
Привет! Мой опыт работы в области делового администрирования более 10 лет. Я смогу  объяснить Вам нюансы делового общения и деловой переписки.
Предлагаю Вам уроки русского языка для работы и бизнеса: написание резюме и подготовка к собеседованию, деловая переписка, деловой этикет, коммуникации в бизнесе.

teacher_info.intro:
DEAR STUDENTS!

If you have unscheduled lessons in your package but cannot find the suitable time slot, please contact me. I will try to find it for you.

Hi, I'm Olga. I am from Saratov but also lived and worked in St. Petersburg. 
I’m interested in history, art, architecture, films, and photography. I love studying and walking in beautiful places. 
Apart from that I enjoy learning languages and it helps in my work. I like trying new methods of learning and special polyglots' techniques. I find it very exciting and inspiring to realise that you can speak or understand a foreign language.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified Russian teacher with over 9 years of teaching experience (prepare for TORFL exam)
teacher_info.introduction: I graduated from the Saratov State University and have a Specialist Degree in Linguistics and Ph.D in Language Theory. I have been teaching different foreign languages for almost ten years. I completed several courses in teaching Russian as a Foreign Language and for last six years I have been teaching General and Business Russian at the university and language schools. I can for the TORFL exam.
teacher_info.about_me:
DEAR STUDENTS!

If you have unscheduled lessons in your package but cannot find the suitable time slot, please contact me. I will try to find it for you.

Hi, I'm Olga. I am from Saratov but also lived and worked in St. Petersburg. 
I’m interested in history, art, architecture, films, and photography. I love studying and walking in beautiful places. 
Apart from that I enjoy learning languages and it helps in my work. I like trying new methods of learning and special polyglots' techniques. I find it very exciting and inspiring to realise that you can speak or understand a foreign language.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I’m a native Russian speaker and a certified teacher with many years’ experience teaching Russian at the university, different language schools, and online. I can use formal and informal styles of teaching: improving your grammar, vocabulary and pronunciation for the test or doing some fun activities and talking about anything you’d like to. 
I mainly work with adults but I also have taught children through the games and entertaining activities. I have experience teaching Russian for specific professions such as medical workers, biologists, and marines. I prepare for the TORFL exams.
I’m good at explaining things in simple terms and working at a pace that is comfortable for a student.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons are personalised and based on my students' level, goals and interests.
During the first lesson I spend some time finding out about their language skills and needs and then make their individualised programme.
I generally start with a short warm-up activity and finish with a feedback to my students. I provide all the materials so there is no need to worry about that. I use different textbooks, Internet resources, and my own worksheets. I love to create learning materials that help my students. You can find the free ones at the_key_to_russian account.
I am a keen listener and give my students the opportunity to talk.
I am flexible and ready to meet your needs and requirements.

course_info.trial_description:
In a trial lesson we can work on any aspect of Russian that you are intrested in at the moment.

We can discuss your goal and the learning strategy suitable for you to make the plan for your studying.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian from scratch
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course I will introduce you to the Russian alphabet through international and borrowed words and mnemonics, so you will learn it easily and will be able to read quickly. Don't be afraid of Cyrillic characters! You will also learn basic vocabulary, some grammar structures and essential phrases. 
The course consits of 4 or 5 lessons depending on the duration of the session. If you buy a package and learn everything in less than 5 lessons we will continue with another course.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for bilingual kids
pro_course_detail.description:
Уроки русского для детей русскоговорящих родителей, живущих не в русскоязычных странах.

These classes will help your child not to forget Russian in another country and improve their conversational and reading skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Exam Preparation Course (TORFL)
pro_course_detail.description:
The preparation includes the diagnostics of your current level and the consultation on the exam structure if needed.

In this course, we will work on closing your knowledge gaps, focus on the specific tasks and the best way to do them, practice in doing sample tests. I leave time consuming tasks for homework and correct them outside lesson time.

Throughout class I'll be sending you detailed language feedback and notes, both corrections and suggestions based on your own personal mistakes to improve your answers according to the TORFL assessment criteria.

I understand how important the examination is for a student and trying to do my best to make them feel well-prepared and confident to take the test.

You can choose the specific part of the examination (eg. Speaking or Writing) to prepare  for if you like.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description: Informal classes without plan or program but a good opportunity to develop your conversational skills in Russian with a professional teacher ;)

pro_course_detail.title: In depth Russian course
pro_course_detail.description:
If you want to learn Russian in a more profound way, to understand how its grammar work, to focus on the pronunciation or other language aspects the course is for you.

I love teaching grammar and explain how it all works together. I use more academic approach in teaching here and give more details about the theory of the Russian language.

The course will be useful for professionals, for those who are learning or learnt Russian at the university or want to prepare for it. 

The lessons are also suitable for all language lovers who enjoy to talk about language structure and discover some truly interesting facts.

I will choose the material appropriate for your level and requirements.

pro_course_detail.title: Communicate in Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
The course is for those who need to start communicating in Russian or develop their speaking or writing skills as soon as possible.

If you need Russian to speak with the members of your family or friends, for your work or business partners, for travelling or some other specific situations you can choose this course.

I give here only the basic grammar that you might really need for your goal. We will concentrate on the essential vocabulary and phrases that are commonly used in the particular situations and there will be a lot of practice. 

If you feel overwhelmed with the amount of topics to study of cannot choose the right material to start with and progress fast enough this course is for you.

Speaking practice is the best way to start communicating in another language!

teacher_info.intro: Всем привет, меня зовут Алена. Очень рада знакомству. Пара слов обо мне: мне 20 лет, я студентка последнего курса европейского университета, направление: управление бизнесом. Работаю фрилансером в качестве контент-мейкера и дизайнера.
teacher_info.about_me: Всем привет, меня зовут Алена. Очень рада знакомству. Пара слов обо мне: мне 20 лет, я студентка последнего курса европейского университета, направление: управление бизнесом. Работаю фрилансером в качестве контент-мейкера и дизайнера.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я могу помочь вам лучше понять язык, который вы изучаете. Я верю, что можно выучить язык, слушая и разговаривая с носителем. Весёлое времяпрепровождение и делиться опытом - лучший способ на изучение чего-либо.

У меня дружелюбный стиль преподавания. Буду общаться с Вами как ваш друг, сохраняя личные границы. Я люблю и умею слушать.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Я предлагаю разговорные уроки, так как, на мой взгляд, это лучший проверенный способ улучшить и выучить любой новый язык. Мы можем вести беседы на любые темы, которые вы выберете, или на все, что мы выберем. Я буду стремиться улучшить ваше произношение, грамматику и расширить ваш словарный запас.

course_info.trial_description: Приглашаю на пробный разговор со мной :) Во время этого урока мы с Вами познакомимся ближе и сможем понять, подходим ли друг другу для проведения уроков и практики языка.

Якщо ви хочете поліпшити свої знання розмовної української мови, тоді ця можливість саме для Вас! Тут ми можемо поговорити на різні теми і в будь-який час обговорити ваші окремі питання разом.

If you want to improve your knowledge of spoken Ukrainia, then this opportunity is for you! Here we can talk about different topics and discuss your individual issues together at any time.

If you want to improve your knowledge of spoken Russian, then this opportunity is for you! Here we can talk about different topics and discuss your individual issues together at any time.

pro_course_detail.title: German Grammar A1 - C1
pro_course_detail.description:
*Online* (For *offline* please scroll down)

Intense lessons. 

What to expect expect? 
- a placement test 
- a lot of exercises in the lesson
- addressing simple and advanced grammar 
- homework after each lesson 

Requirements: 
- reading skills 

Please send me your grammar request 1-2 days before the lesson. 

Different grammar trainers are used in the lesson. 
Welcome!

Important: I hold a class on Zoom. 

Поработаем над нужной Вам грамматической темой. 

Чего ожидать от урока: 
- тест 
- много упражнений 
- разбор грамматики разного уровня сложности 
- домашнее задание 

Условия: 
- умение читать

*Offline*
Let's bump up your grammar power! Ideal for those looking for suitable time for learning :)

You want to 
- be able to accomplish grammar homework at any possible time (at night, on the weekend),
- receive a review 3 days later,
- get links to the relative grammar rules,
- get some advice on improvement.

Start here: 

1. You send me the grammar topic, I send you tailor-made worksheets* OR you do a placement test if needed and then receive worksheets to complete,
2. When you are done, you send your answers back to me.
3. Up to 3 days later you receive my corrections, useful links and advices. 

* I can check exercises from your textbooks.

pro_course_detail.title: German for Beginners / Test Preparation A1
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот курс подойдет для тех, кто начинает изучать язык с нуля. Мы будем заниматься по учебным пособиям. Вы будете получать домашнее задание. 

После успешно пройденного курса Вы можете сдать экзамен Start Deutsch A1 (Goethe) или другой аналогичный ему. Оптимальный вариант - это занятия два раза в неделю по полтора часа плюс домашние задания. В таком темпе уровень А1 достигается за 2-3 месяца. 

Давайте двигаться к Вашей цели вместе! Напишите мне, чтобы договориться о вводном (пробном) уроке. 

Drop me a message if you are interested in taking this course!

pro_course_detail.title: German Specialized Course A2 - B1
pro_course_detail.description:
For students with at least A2 level

You prepare for work in a special field, for a trip or mission? 
 
Get some training that goes beyond students' books. I will help you to find the needed materials extra for your FIELD. 

The essential part of our lesson is that I will coach you how you can dive into language and speak it with confidence. How to acquire new vocabulary, as well as how to develop your listening and speaking skills in a new field.

pro_course_detail.title: Polish - Coaching Course
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for Russian speakers only. 

Курс для русскоязычных:
- с коммуникативным уровнем польского языка, либо
- с начальным уровнем польского, но владеющих белорусским либо украинским языком. 

Курс носит коучинговый характер. Значит, вы активно участвуете во всех стадиях обучения.  Ставите конкретную цель в отношении языка, берете ответственность за то, сколько работаете, выбираете, какие инструменты более эффективны для вас. Я во всем вам помогаю, направляю и поддерживаю. 

В начале 

На первом уроке курса мы вместе определяем интенсивность вашей работы с языком. 
В первую очередь, речь про самостоятельную работу. От меня вы получаете рекомендации по материалам. Вместе мы подбираем вам практики, с помощью которых вы сможете сделать иностранный язык частью вашей жизни, поддерживать и развивать свои навыки.  

Далее
Далее, на занятиях мы ведем спонтанные беседы по изученным вами темам (оформление документов в Польше, устройство на работу, поход к врачу и т.д.). Я даю обратную связь по вашей речи. Мы вместе анализируем и оцениваем вашу самостоятельную работу. У вас также есть возможность задать точечные вопросы по пройденному материалу.

Вы можете начать этот курс только после урока-знакомства (пробного урока), подав заявку на подходящий пакет по 45 или 60 мин. 

Если у вас появились вопросы, я открыта к диалогу. :)

teacher_info.introduction:
My name is Yulia, I professionally teach Russian as a foreign language.
My goal is to teach you how to speak Russian and understand how Russians truly speak. 
For speaking practice, I use very active movies, real interviews, and songs. At the same time I believe that reading is a basic yet good way to increase vocabulary, to remember grammar constructions, and to learn many interesting things about Russia. So let’s read and discuss! Sports, politics, culture, space, literature, so many interesting things await you. You can listen to most of what I prepare, thereby  training your listening ability too.
I’d like to propose you a course«Verbs of Motion through the Russian TV show «The Kitchen». I did my best so that you could use the verbs of motion not at random as is often the case, but correctly, understanding nuances and feeling them. My favorite modern TV show, «The Kitchen» will absolutely help us. 

I am often online, so you can request an instant tutoring lesson to get to know me, to determine your level, goals, and interests, and to discover your strengths and weaknesses. I am a flexible teacher, and I strive to improve my lessons through your suggestions, because I think that engaging lessons are more effective. Who I can help: 
- children from elementary school. I use more interactive materials to hook children’s attention and to help them speak Russian.  
- who just want to improve their speaking ability 
- who want to increase their vocabulary through reading stories. 
 - who want to increase their listing ability through Russian series, cartoons, politicians' interviews and so on that I propose to listen to with transcripts before our lessons and to discuss them. 
- who need to prepare for exam TРКИ.

pro_course_detail.description: INFORMAL TUTORING - You are in charge and you set the direction and pace of our lessons. pro_course_detail.title: Russian language: a Real Breakthrough ((B1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Video presentation of a an example lesson is here https://youtu.be/QVbagJBvBMs
I designed it for those who have already reached a B1 level, but are no longer making progress.  The idea of this course was born as a result of more than eight years teaching and learning online.  Each lesson is based on an interesting news item, event, person, moment in Russian history or something similar.  During the lesson, new words will be used several times in different contexts, and then repeated in subsequent lessons.  (This method is called interval repetition.)  I will also use memory exercises borrowed from translator’s training, interesting exercises for remembering new words and grammar and using them actively, and funny pictures.  All this will help you remember many new words and use them actively.

This is a course for
People who want to improve listening (I have podcast for each lesson https://anchor.fm/yulia-stepanova ) or reading, but find textbooks boring
Those who like to see the stresses marked on words but wonder why this stops happening as early as B1 level.  I make sure that all my texts have stresses marked – that is very important for good pronunciation.
People who work hard to learn words but forget them because of lack of practice.
People who are curious about past and present happenings in Russia, that is, culture, space exploration, literature, history, interesting places and the Russian people
People who are tired of making the same mistakes
People who want a lively discussion and to have fun.

pro_course_detail.title: Welcome, Children! Добрó пожáловать, дéти!
pro_course_detail.description:
For Bilingual-Children of 5y.o. and elder. I suggest taking 30 or 45 minute lessons. I do not accept 1 h. lessons.
I use Zoom. Check that your child can use it, can draw, can ask permission to manage my screen without your help.
Lessons for Bilingual: The goal for the bilingual course is to maintain and develop speaking ability, and to read much and write correctly. For this course we don't aim to pass exams in Russian schools. During the lessons we do linguistic riddles, write on a virtual whiteboard or in a notebook and read classic children books (Gaidar, Dragunsky etc.) and magazines ("Лео и Тиг", "Фиксики" etc) and discuss them. I do my best to cultivate love for reading and writing Russian. We can also study some basics maths, nature and Russian grammar using учи.ру and it will be very funny and useful for general knowledge about Russia. 
I have three bilingual children of my own, aged 10, 15 and 18 (their second language is Japanese), so I know how my husband struggles to make them speak Japanese. 
I have puppets, cars, monsters, dinosaurs and dolls, children magazines in PDF that I adapt for for your child's level.
Every child is unique. To make the first lessons more productive, please tell me about your child, his/her temper and interests.

Recommended strongly if the goal is to pass Russian language exams, because the course is based just on the vocabulary and grammar constructions for the tests.

pro_course_detail.title: General English - Customized Class
pro_course_detail.description:
General English including all the aspects of the language (speaking, listening, reading and writing). Each class is completely customized.
In our classes, we can focus on your personal needs (vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation, speaking or writing skills), anything you need help with and anything you want to improve. During our first class, we will get to know each other, you will tell me about your experience of learning English or Russian before, I will work out a personalized study plan for you that we will follow. The course enables you to improve your communication skills and acquire fluency.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
These are classes for students who want to improve their speaking and listening skills, to develop fluency and confidence while increasing vocabulary by acquiring useful words and phrases in use. 
This is a non-textbook based language course, however, if there are grammar areas you find out you'd like to improve, we may consider including bite-sized grammar topics in each lesson. You are advised to: 
1) Pick a topic that interests you beforehand. It can either be a specific subject or just a more general one, such as travel, food and drink, hobbies and sports, home and garden, pets and animals and many others. 
2) Receive a video link, a list of questions or an article on the topic before a lesson.
3) Get ready to discuss the material in class. It usually requires students to retell the source, to think about their personal attitude toward the topic and to be prepared to answer the teacher's questions and to hold a discussion, applying the new vocabulary you faced in the source.
While we talk, I will write down the most common mistakes you make in pronunciation, grammar, and word choice. At the end of the lesson I will send you the list of mistakes and we will correct them together. If needed, I will teach you the grammar rule or the proper pronunciation, and will ask you to work on examples until you are comfortable with the rule.

The goal of the course is to motivate and inspire young minds to learn.

To begin, choose a topic for communication. Then we will talk on this topic. During the conversation, I will correct you. If you don’t know Russian at all, or you know badly enough, then we will start with the basics. For this there are cards and other materials. But you will speak Russian.

teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Malika. I am from Kazakhstan. My native languages are russian and kazakh.
After school I went to college where I studied Interpretation (English). I got my bachelor degree in Oriental studies at Eurasian National University. My region of study was Japan. I learned Japanese language as well as economics, politics, history and culture, etc. Went to Japan on behalf of short-term exchange program MIRAI. 
While Junior year I got interested in Korea and started to learn Korean. Afterwards I studied in Seoul for 1 term.
Recently started to learn Greek, Turkish, Farsi and German.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Being a native russian and kazakh speaker which are two really different languages from different language families I have got not only knowledge, but also sense of what might be a problem spot for most of my students. Also knowing other languages like English, Korean, Japanese and others let me be more productive with the students.
I am very patient with students, but I am also a demanding teacher (in a good sense).
teacher_info.teaching_style:
With each lesson I try to speak russian more to a student, to the extent of their understanding and comfortable level of difficulty.
Besides grammar, which is must of course, we focus on "real" language, using video materials, vlogs, articles, news, songs.
Doing your homework makes a great deal of success in the learning process (especially w/russian). There is a time-limit in our classes, so I would really like it if the students used our time together more productive, by doing their studies at home.
I have got a wide range of materials, including short cutouts from russian series, movies, vlogs and other sources of the language.

course_info.trial_description: Hello! Book a trial lesson and give yourself a chance. You will not regret :) You will learn a lot in these 30 minutes.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Speaking Class For All Levels
pro_course_detail.description:
My speaking lessons are for all levels. 

My aim in the lessons is to provide you a comfortable environment where you can get confidence to speak. 

We will play games and we will talk about various topics.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian Course For All Levels
pro_course_detail.description:
I am happy to tell you about my lessons.
The structure of my lessons differ depending on my students' needs. But on every each of them we, my student and I, focus on grammar, vocabulary, comprehension and fluency.
Of course, a lesson with a beginner and a lesson with an advanced student will differ in a  teacher-student speech length. The more confident students get the more I encourage them to talk in Russian.
I always ask my students what their purposes in learning are and what they want to learn in particular.

Usually I start lessons with a small conversation to make students comfortable and get them used to the language before diving into grammar. After explaining grammar we do a lot of interactive excercises together, playing games trying to remember both grammar and vocabulary.
Some days we can focuse more on conversation or grammar, nevertheless I try to get all the other activities involved in each lesson.
Depending on students interests/needs we choose topics to talk about, so the students would not get bored.

Every now and then I check with a student on their goals in language learning and what they want me to add to our lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Be brave like Ukraine! Ukrainian from scratch
pro_course_detail.description:
"Be brave like Ukraine!"
Ukrainian culture is getting more and more popular around the world. The war brought people together. Pick this lesson to get closer to Ukrainian language and therefore people's mindset. 
_____________________________
During the first very lesson we are going to learn some greetings, however the main attention is going to be dedicated to the alphabet (it's Cyrillic) and the reading rules. The alphabet part is one of the most challenging parts, so once you complete it spectacular activities will not be far behind ❤

pro_course_detail.title: Be brave like Ukraine! Українська для студентів рівня intermediate
pro_course_detail.description:
Якщо ти вже розмовляєш українською, але тобі не вистачає практики, то запрошую на мої розмовні уроки, де ми можемо 1) обрати будь-яку тему, що тебе цікавить; 2) дивитися і обговорювати відео/серіали чи новини; 3) слухати пісні і занурюватись в український mindset; 4) читати поезію або пости український блогерів. Загалом робити все, що заманеться* + кайфувати** разом. 

_____
*все, що заманеться - whatever you want
**кайфувати - to enjoy (slang)

На занятиях мы будем использовать учебные материалы, практиковать использование грамматических конструкций и изучать грамматические темы, читать тексты и обсуждать лексику. teacher_info.intro: Hello everyone! My name is Diana. I am a professional teacher with a passion for languages. Having graduated from Ural Federal University with a degree in linguistics, I know from firsthand experience how to learn and teach languages effectively. Before I started working on italki I had been teaching Russian to my tandem partners in different languages.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello everyone! My name is Diana. I am a professional teacher with a passion for languages. Having graduated from Ural Federal University with a degree in linguistics, I know from firsthand experience how to learn and teach languages effectively. Before I started working on italki I had been teaching Russian to my tandem partners in different languages.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Being familiar with English, German and Spanish grammar, I know very well what difficulties people speaking these languages might face as they learn Russian. To learn Russian of course you have to be persistent and focused on your goal but there is a range of methods to make this process vivid, sparkling, exciting and full of curious discoveries. Bearing in mind that learning has to be enjoyable and fulfilling, I help my students find the most effective ways to guide them through Russian.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I encourage students to speak a lot. We can discuss everyday life, speak about things you are passionate about, comment on videos and small texts addressing global issues. 
I provide students with a lot of useful materials to work on grammar and vocabulary. We can work more on specific topics and systematize your knowledge.
We will also work on pronunciation and listening comprehension skills, as they are crucial for a successful dialogue. 
The structure of our classes will be highly individual.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Russian is my mother language and I’m also fluent in English, Chinese, Kyrgyz, and Kazakh. I have over 5 years’  Russian, Chinese, and English teaching experience both online and offline. My students are from all over the world and their ages are in the range of 5 to 65 years old. 

Building on my over 5 years’ teaching experience in China, and in some other parts of the world, my work in this sphere deepened my understanding of different countries’ educational theory. It helps me to provide more efficient learning direction according to the requirements of students from any countries.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My teaching style is quit unique. I can help you to understand everything easier and clearer. We will work on the main three aspect, such as: Grammar, Vocabulary, and practicing. 
Here I can give you a simple and clear example!
 Let’s suppose that grammar we learn is like a brand-new sports car, but this car won’t move from its place without a fuel inside, well if the car is a grammar, then the vocabulary is the fuel for this car, and of course if you don’t know how to drive it these things are just useless. I would say Practicing is like the skill of driving this super car named language.
I make an individual preparation for each student, based on their needs and their levels.

teacher_info.about_teacher: As a language student, I know the struggle of learning a new language, so it would be my pleasure to help you learn one in a more relaxed and spontaneous manner.
teacher_info.teaching_style: The best way to learn a language is to speak it. My goal is to help you develop a stronger confidence in the language through conversations on whichever topic! Speak it!

course_info.trial_description: Try it out! Let's first get to know each other and then you can see for yourself if this course is something for you :)

pro_course_detail.title: Speak Russian!

pro_course_detail.title: Speak Dutch!

teacher_info.intro:
Я учусь в магистратуре, изучаю информатику и биоинформатику. Я работала в ИТ, интересуюсь разными темами, на которые мы сможем поговорить.
I study on Master of Computer Science program and learn bioinformatics. I worked in IT. I’m interested in various topics which we can talk about.
teacher_info.about_me:
Я учусь в магистратуре, изучаю информатику и биоинформатику. Я работала в ИТ, интересуюсь разными темами, на которые мы сможем поговорить.
I study on Master of Computer Science program and learn bioinformatics. I worked in IT. I’m interested in various topics which we can talk about.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я являюсь носителем русского языка. У меня есть 2 года опыта помощи в изучении русского языка иностранцам.
I’m native Russian speaker. I have 2 years experience of tutoring foreigners with learning Russian.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я предлагаю уроки, основанные на неформальной беседе. Я думаю, что чем более неформальные и развлекательные уроки, тем они более успешные. Мы сможем поговорить на много разных тем.
I focus on informal conversation in my lessons. I firmly believe that more informal and entertaining would be our lessons, more joy you’d get and more benefit. We can talk about plenty of different topics.

course_info.trial_description:
Let's get to know each other. We will talk in Russian (maybe a bit of English to explain). Please, text me in advance about your purposes and wishes. 

Давайте познакомимся. Мы поговорим на русском (я могу объяснить некоторые вещи на английском, если потребуется). Пожалуйста, напишите мне заранее о ваших целях и желаниях.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian (I do NOT prep.) / Разговорный Русский (Я НЕ готовлю доп.материалы)
pro_course_detail.description:
I offer to speak Russian. This type of lesson is ONLY conversation. If you want to improve your grammar or work with additional materials (textbook, exercises, videos, articles, etc.) please choose other types of lessons with me. 
During the lesson we will speak in Russian about several topics. I will correct you and give you some tips for improvement. You will master mostly your speaking (and also a bit of listening). I have topics to talk about, but you are free to suggest topics of your personal interest. 

Я предлагаю поговорить по-русски. На уроке мы ТОЛЬКО разговариваем. Если вы хотите улучшить грамматику или работать с доп. материалами (учебники, упражнения, видео, статьи и т.д.), пожалуйста, выберите другой тип урока со мной.
Во время урока мы будем говорить по-русски на разные темы. Я буду вас корректировать и давать советы по улучшению. Вы улучшите в большей степени разговорную речь (и немного аудирование). У меня есть темы для разговора, но вы свободно можете предлагать темы, которые вам интересны.

pro_course_detail.title: Structured lessons (A1-C2) / Структурированные уроки
pro_course_detail.description:
Let’s focus on 4 aspects of language in balance: speaking, writing, listening, and reading. Most of the exams check your ability to produce (speaking and writing) and perceive (reading, listening) the language. We can focus on academic Russian as well as casual depending on your goals. Please, text me in advance about your purposes and wishes. 

Давайте сосредоточимся на 4 аспектах языка: говорение, письмо, слушание и чтение. Большинство экзаменов проверяют вашу способность воспроизводить (говорение и письмо) и воспринимать (чтение и слушание) язык. В зависимости от ваших целей мы можем сосредоточиться на академическом русском или на повседневном. Пожалуйста, напишите мне заранее о ваших целях и желаниях.

pro_course_detail.title: Grammar focus (A1-C2) / Грамматика
pro_course_detail.description:
Let’s focus on Grammar. That is difficult but still doable. I have course- and workbooks which we can use to study. However, you are welcome to suggest your own preferable books. Please, text me in advance about your purposes and wishes. 

Давайте сосредоточимся на грамматике. Это трудно, но выполнимо. У меня есть учебники, которые мы можем использовать. Однако, вы можете предложить свои варианты учебников. Пожалуйста, напишите мне заранее о ваших целях и желаниях.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi everyone! My name is Darina and I’m a native Russian speaker!
I’m 21 years old and I’m in love with so many things: traveling, reading, spending time with friends and of course helping people to learn the Russian language!
I'm a sertified specialist in economics and management. Currently I'm working in a multinational company as a foreign trade specialist. I’m outgoing and enjoy getting to know people, so I’m convinced we are going to find common ground!
Всем привет! Меня зовут Дарина и я носитель русского языка!
Мне 21 год и я обожаю много различных вещей: путешествовать, читать, проводить время с друзьями, и , конечно же, помогать людям изучать Русский язык.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
Our goal from a lesson is to have both: improve Russian and have good mood! I prepare materials for every student individually. My teaching style is very flexible and changing according to the student’s goal.
Целью нашего урока является как изучение русского языка, так и хорошее настроение после! Я подготавливаю материалы для каждого студента индивидуально. Мой стиль обучения очень гибкий и меняется в зависимости от целей ученика.

course_info.trial_description:
This lesson is a good chance for us to meet each other and decide if you think we're a good match.
It will help us understand whether your needs meet my opportunities.
I will explain you my teching methods and we will also focus on what you're hoping to get from our lessons, so that will help me make our program more productive.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
During this lesson we will pay attention to grammar, alphabet(according to your needs) and pronunciation.
Among other things, we’ll read dialogs, go through various grammatical exercises, practice commonly used phrases. After each lesson you will be provided with the list of new vocabulary we used during our lesson. I will do my best to make you feel confident in each topic of the Russian language.
Let’s start learning this interesting Slavic language together!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian - Intermediate to Advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
During this lesson we will have a conversation, but that doesn't mean we are just going to chat informally, I will also pay attention to your grammar, use of language and vocabulary.
Before the lesson we will consider the topics we are going to talk about.
I'll do my best to help you meet your aims and goals.
Данный урок будет проводиться в виде диалога, но это не означает, что мы будем просто болтать. В процессе беседы, я также буду уделять внимание вашей грамматике, словарному запасу, а также правильному использованию языковых конструкций.
Перед началом урока, мы обозначим список тем, которые вам интересны.
Я приложу все усилия для того, чтобы вы добились своей цели.
